as Google CEO Google just announced a huge change in management. As of April, Eric Schmidt is out as CEO, and co-founder Larry Page will take over his day-to-day duties. Meanwhile, co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his energy to strategic projects, in particular working on new products. Eric Schmidt 's new role will be Executive Chairman.
